announcement.subtitle: Witnet现在是以太坊的侧链
announcement.button: 从solidity智能合约学习如何使用Witnet

title.main: 与{0} 个区块链特征相吻合的去中心化预言机

decentralized_oracle.paragraph_1: 如果没有可靠的预言机，智能合约很容易受到黑客攻击、走向腐败和造成金钱损失。
decentralized_oracle.paragraph_2: Witnet 利用最先进的加密和经济技术为您的智能合约提供安全的数据输入。

ecosystem.subtitle: 许多部分已经到位，许多其他部分正在由广大的社区建设者积极“施工”。

node.title: witnet-rust完整归档节点
node.content: 运行您的完全验证节点并开始赚取用于挖掘块和解决数据请求的wit代币。

sheikah.title: Sheikah钱包（桌面版）
sheikah.content: Sheikah 是一款高隐私且用户友好的钱包应用，用于在 Windows、Mac OS 和 GNU/Linux 上管理您的wit代币。

truffle_box.title: Ethereum Truffle工具箱
truffle_box.content: 使用 Witnet Truffle工具箱 几乎可以立即将 witnet 集成到您的 Solidity 合约中。

explorer.title: witnet网络区块浏览器
explorer.content: Witnet网络区块浏览器让您对 Witnet 区块链中发生的事情有一个中立的看法。

monitor.title: witnet.live网络监控器
monitor.content: Witnet.live网络监控器跟踪 witnet 网络的运行状况。

next.title: 您下一步创建什么？
next.content: 您闹钟是否有一些令人兴奋的 Witnet 应用？资助计划即将公布，敬请期待！

footer.ado_text: Witnet is part of the Alliance of Decentralized Oracles (ADO), a joint effort by leading decentralized oracle solutions to make the life of smart contract developers easier by creating oracle standards. Learn more about the ADO at {0}

copyright.base: © 2018–2021 by {0} and individual contributors. Content available under a {1}.

get_involved.content: From developers to miners and enthusiasts, the witnet community prouds itself on always being welcoming, discussing the things that really matter, and ensuring that witnet plays a key role in the foundations of Web3.
get_involved.subtitle: Get involved now

follow.title: Follow the project
follow.content: Keep up with the latest news on Twitter

join_discussion.title: Join the discussion
join_discussion.content: Help us shape the future of the project.

hero.description: Witnet enables your smart contracts to react to real world events with strong crypto-economic guarantees.

nav_bar.social_image_alt: Open Witnet's Github on new window

testimonial_1.text: "Witnet is a next generation crypto Oracle. You'll hear a lot more about it in 2021."
testimonial_1.author: Michael Arrington, Founder of TechCrunch

testimonial_2.text: "The oracle that truly decentralized blockchains and the Web3 deserve"
testimonial_2.author: Luis Cuende, Co-Founder of Aragon

testimonial_3.text: "Oracle price manipulation was a hot topic in 2020, causing many financial losses. We are confident that Witnet is able to withstand these issues and provide the security and decentralization we’re looking for"
testimonial_3.author: Mark Tan, Co-Founder of RiveX

wit_token.title: Incentivized by the wit token
wit_token.text: The Witnet decentralized oracle runs on its own blockchain and relies on the token for incentivization of independently run nodes that resolve the data requests and agree on the results.
